snippet.title: Threads of Time | Official Announce Trailer | TGS 2024
snippet.description:
Threads of Time is an era-spanning, turn-based RPG inspired by the timeless classics. Embark on a journey through time, gather a party of charismatic heroes from across ages, and uncover a plot that threatens to unravel the past, present, and future.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2090210/Threads_of_Time/
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/threadsoftime/9PPNV0NCL881

Official Newsletter: https://threadsoftimegame.com/community
Discord: https://discord.gg/FBdgdbAVbf
Twitter: https://x.com/RiyoGames
